column4: I updated the system now I have low resolution, problem with nvidia drivers
what is the output of: lspci | grep -i vga
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation GeForce 8800 GTS 512 (rev a2)
sudo apt-get --purge remove nvidia*; sudo apt-get --purge autoremove; sudo apt-get clean; sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg; sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx-180
